Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: Si allega un riassunto delle specifiche esperienze professionali caratterizzate da attivita' di ricerca attinenti al settore concorsuale per cui e' presentata la domanda per l'abilitazione

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: PRESENTAZIONE SU INVITO: Research in Behavior in Games and Markets, Harvard University, Cambridge, MA (USA), "Trust, Trustworthiness and Group Identity: A Laboratory Experimental Approach"
RELATORE A CONVEGNO: IAREP-SABE Conference, Paris (France),"Let bygones be bygones? An experimental investigation on the impact of past outcomes on evaluation of risky outcomes"
RELATORE A CONVEGNO: Strategic Interaction Group (ESI) Spring Workshop 2007, Jena (Germany), "onformism and Social Connections: An Empirical Analysis of Self-Commitment to Food Purchase"
RELATORE A CONVEGNO: ESA 2007 World Meeting, Rome (Italy), "Scenario-based Satisficing In Saving---A Theoretical And Experimental Analysis"
ORGANIZZAZIONE: membro del comitato scientifico e organizzatore conferenza "What is the behavioral in behavioral economics" Trento (Italy), 5-6 June 2008
RELATORE A CONVEGNO: 2008 ESA European Regional Meeting, Lyon (France), "Reciprocity and Social Effects in a Multi--Agent Investment Game"

RELATORE A CONVEGNO: Third Nordic Conference on Behavioral and Experimental Economics, Copenhagen (Denmark), "Reciprocity and Social Effects: An Experimental Analysis of Choices in the Investment Game"
RELATORE A CONVEGNO: 2009 Florence Behavioural and Experimental Economics Workshop, Florence (Italy), "The Sly Fellows: An Experimental Analysis "
PRESENTAZIONE SU INVITO: Brown Bag lunch Seminar - University of Innsbruck (Austria), "The Generosity Game".
RELATORE A CONVEGNO: ESA - Regional Meeting Europe 2009, Innsbruck (Austria), "Making the World a Better Place: Evidence from the Generosity Game"
PRESENTAZIONE SU INVITO: Third IMPRS Topic Workshop 2009, Trento (Italy), "Determinants of In-group Bias: Is Group Affiliation Mediated by Guilt-Aversion?"
PRESENTAZIONE SU INVITO: DEAS Seminars in Economics (Milan, Italy), "Making the World a Better Place: Evidence from the Generosity Game".
RELATORE A CONVEGNO: IMEBE 2010, Bilbao (Spain), "Group Membership, Team Preferences, and Expectations"
RELATORE A CONVEGNO: 2011 Florence Workshop on Behavioural and Experimental Economics, "Equity Concerns in Risky Choices An Experimental Analysis"
RELATORE A CONVEGNO: 2011 International Meeting of the Economic Science Association, University of Chicago (USA), "Equity Concerns in Risky Choices"
PRESENTAZIONE SU INVITO: Sant'Anna School of Advanced Studies, Pisa (Italy) - Seminar Series "Risk and Inequity Aversion: An Experiment".
PRESENTAZIONE SU INVITO: Luncheon Research Seminar-Free University of Bozen-Bolzano, "Equity Concerns in Risky Choices: An Experimental Analysis."
PRESENTAZIONE SU INVITO: University of Gothenburg, School of Business, Economics and Law (Sweden), "Keep It or Sell It? An Experimental Analysis of the Disposition Effect"
RELATORE A CONVEGNO: Experimental Finance Conference 2012, University of Luxembourg, "Keep It or Sell It? An Experimental Investigation of the Disposition Effect"
RELATORE A CONVEGNO: ESA European Conference 2012, University of Cologne (Germany), "Would you mind if I get more? An experimental study of the envy game"
ORGANIZZAZIONE: organizzatore e membro del comitato scientifico del workshop internazionale: "Risk and Social Preferences"
RELATORE A CONVEGNO: ESA World Conference 2013, University of Zurich (Switzerland),"Hold it or Sell it? An Experimental Analysis of the Disposition Effect"
RELATORE A CONVEGNO: AEW ``Alhambra meets Colosseo'', LUISS University (Italy), "Hold it or Sell it? An Experimental Analysis of the Disposition Effect"
PRESENTAZIONE SU INVITO: ESSEXLab Seminars, University of Essex (UK), "An Experimental Investigation of Peer Effects in Investment Choices"
PRESENTAZIONE SU INVITO: UEA-CBESS Seminars, University of East Anglia (UK), "Hold it or Sell it? An Experimental Analysis of the Disposition Effect"
PRESENTAZIONE SU INVITO: Institutions, Games, and Experiments, Max Plank Institute Jena (Germany), "Buying and Selling Risk An Experiment Investigation of Evaluation Asymmetries"
PRESENTAZIONE SU INVITO: Brown Bag Seminar, University of Innsbruck (Austria), "Guilt Feelings and Justice: An Experimental Investigation"
PRESENTAZIONE SU INVITO: Brown Bag Seminar, University of Innsbruck (Austria), "Your Money is in Good Hands! An Experiment about Pecuniary Sanction and Accountability in Agency Dilemmas"
PRESENTAZIONE SU INVITO: Seminar Series, University of Erfurt (Germany), "Buying and Selling Risk: An Experiment Investigation of Evaluation Asymmetries"
RELATORE A CONVEGNO: 2014 LabSi Workshop on Behavioral and Experimental Finance, University of Siena (Italy), "An Experiment about Pecuniary Sanction and Accountability in Agency Dilemmas".
PRESENTAZIONE SU INVITO: Seminar Series, LUISS (Rome), "Buying and Selling Risk An Experiment Investigation of Evaluation Asymmetries"
RELATORE A CONVEGNO: Experimental Finance 2015, Nijmegen (the Netherlands), "Would Slowing Finance Improve Financial Markets Efficiency? Some Experimental Evidence".
RELATORE A CONVEGNO: 2015 European meeting of the Economic Science Association, Heidelberg (Germany),"Social Preferences and Investment in Risk Protection: An Experimental Study"

Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Responsabile scientifico per la raccolta di dati di tipo sperimentale nell’ambito del progetto HealthyMe promosso dalla Fondazione Bruno Kessler (FBK), Trento (Italia).

Responsabile scientifico dello sviluppo di una piattaforma decisionale di educazione finanziaria nell'ambito della convenzione tra Università degli Studi di Trento e la Commissione Nazionale per le Società e la Borsa (CONSOB)

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Vice direttore (deputy manager) del centro di ricerca Cognitive and Experimental Economics Laboratory (CEEL www-ceel.economia.unitn.it/). I compiti svolti riguardano la gestione del laboratorio di economia sperimentale, del campione dei partecipanti agli esperimenti e delle strutture tecniche.

Responsabilita' scientifica per progetti.content: Principal Investigator 2012 Research Grant Einaudi Institue for Economics and Finance (EIEF)
